body_html:
Regarding
https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/importerror-dlopen-cannot-load-any-more-object-with-static-tls-torch-only/7864

In my code, it imports nltk libraries.
I resolved the problem by import torch in advance import nltk.

Maybe it can also depend on OS; It does not happen on CentOS, but appeared on Ubuntu 14.04.5 LTS
body_text:
Regarding
https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/importerror-dlopen-cannot-load-any-more-object-with-static-tls-torch-only/7864
In my code, it imports nltk libraries.
I resolved the problem by import torch in advance import nltk.
Maybe it can also depend on OS; It does not happen on CentOS, but appeared on Ubuntu 14.04.5 LTS
body:
Regarding 
https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/importerror-dlopen-cannot-load-any-more-object-with-static-tls-torch-only/7864

In my code, it imports nltk libraries.
I resolved the problem by `import torch` in advance `import nltk`.

Maybe it can also depend on OS; It does not happen on CentOS, but appeared on Ubuntu 14.04.5 LTS
